data.eml:eml: New findings of rare or little-known alpheid shrimp genera (Crustacea, Decapoda) in Moorea, French Polynesia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Anker, Arthur (2010): New findings of rare or little-known alpheid shrimp genera (Crustacea, Decapoda) in Moorea, French Polynesia. Zootaxa 2403: 23-41, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.194125
